title: How 'Browser-in-the-Middle' Attacks Steal Sessions in Seconds
description: Would you expect an end user to log on to a cybercriminal’s computer, open their browser, and type in their usernames and passwords? Hopefully not! But that’s essentially what happens if they fall victim to a Browser-in-the-Middle (BitM) attack.
